Intro Why Video Documentation? Knowing Your Audience Methodology Video Selection Coding
Visual Aids Presenting Information Video Qualities Supplemental Material Conclusion

Video Selection

In order for the videos to be fairly similar, all screencasts are related to MySQL. A beginning level video would be creating a basic select query, while an advanced tutorial would be making configuration changes to the database server. Videos in the paper will be referenced by their ID number throughout this website.

The following videos were selected for viewing:
